import React from "react"; function About() { return (

About Me

Hello! I'm [Your Name], a passionate nutritionist with over [X] years of experience in helping people achieve their health goals through proper nutrition.

My journey in nutrition began when I discovered the profound impact that food choices have on our overall well-being. This led me to pursue my degree in Nutritional Science from [University].

Through this blog, I aim to share evidence-based nutrition information, practical tips, and delicious recipes that can help you maintain a healthy lifestyle.

When I'm not writing or consulting, you can find me experimenting with new healthy recipes in my kitchen or staying active through yoga and hiking.

); } export default About;
